/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.0.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/main.cpp.o -o your_executable_name  /opt/homebrew/Cellar/portaudio/19.7.0/lib/libportaudio.dylib
